entities.name: malfoy manor
entities.description: The location where Harry is being taken by the Snatchers.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: One of the Snatchers who has caught Harry. He suggests taking Harry to You-Know-Who.

entities.name: scabior
entities.description: Another Snatcher who is discussing what to do with Harry.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter, the person being caught by the Snatchers.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: A mysterious figure who is mentioned as a possible destination for Harry.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry of Magic, which is mentioned as an alternative destination for Harry.

relationships.description: Greyback suggests taking Potter to Malfoy Manor.
